description.name: Double ram welded bottle jack low profile 20T
description.long_desc:
Two-Stage Hydraulic Bottle Jack – Low Profile, Maximum Performance!


If you need a durable and compact tool to lift heavy loads, the 20T hydraulic bottle jack is the perfect solution. Designed for demanding users, it offers reliability and precision.


Technical Specifications:



  • Lifting Capacity: 20T

  • Minimum Height: 170 mm

  • Maximum Height: 420 mm (with screw extension)

  • Piston Lengths: 2 x 95 mm


Product Features:


Low Profile Design:



  • With a minimum height of just 170 mm, this jack is ideal for working in tight spaces, such as under low-clearance vehicles.


Two-Stage Hydraulic Piston:



  • Features two pistons, each 95 mm in length, offering an extended range of operation and smooth lifting.


Impressive Lifting Capacity:



  • Supports a robust 20T load capacity, making it ideal for cars, vans, and industrial machinery.


Adjustable Height:



  • Maximum height of 420 mm with the screw extension, providing versatility for various applications.

  • The screw saddle extension adds an additional 60 mm to the lifting height for even greater flexibility.


Durable Construction:



  • Built with high-quality materials to ensure long-lasting durability and safe operation.


Why Choose This Jack?



  • Designed for Tight Spaces: Its low-profile design and high load capacity make it an excellent choice for automotive workshops and construction sites.

  • Functionality and Convenience: The two-stage piston system ensures faster and more precise lifting.

  • Durability and Safety: Engineered for strength and reliability in demanding conditions.


The 20T hydraulic bottle jack is a professional-grade tool designed to tackle even the heaviest tasks. Perfect for mechanics, workshops, and individual users.

description.name: Double ram welded bottle jack low profile 12T
description.long_desc:
Two-Stage Hydraulic Bottle Jack – Low Profile, Maximum Performance!


If you’re looking for a durable and compact tool to lift heavy loads, the 12T hydraulic bottle jack is the perfect solution. Designed for demanding users, it delivers reliability and precision.


Technical Specifications:



  • Lifting Capacity: 12T

  • Minimum Height: 120 mm

  • Maximum Height: 250 mm with a 40 mm extension cap

  • Piston Lengths: 40 mm and 50 mm


Product Features:


Low Profile Design:



  • With a minimum height of just 120 mm, this jack is ideal for working in tight spaces, such as under low-clearance vehicles.


Two-Stage Hydraulic Piston:



  • Equipped with two pistons (40 mm and 50 mm), providing an extended range of operation and smooth lifting.


Impressive Lifting Capacity:



  • Boasts a robust 12T load capacity, perfect for handling cars, vans, and industrial machinery.


Adjustable Height:



  • Maximum height of 250 mm (with the extension cap), offering versatility for various applications.

  • Includes a 40 mm extension cap to further increase the lifting range for added flexibility.


Durable Construction:



  • Made from high-quality materials to ensure long-lasting durability and safe operation.


Why Choose This Jack?



  • Designed for Tight Spaces: The low-profile design and high load capacity make it an excellent choice for automotive workshops and construction sites.

  • Functionality and Convenience: The two-stage piston system allows for faster and more precise lifting.

  • Durability and Safety: Engineered for strength and reliability in demanding conditions.

description.name: Voltage tester 182mm 100-250V - display box
description.long_desc:
Voltage tester with a length of 185 mm is a reliable and handy tool designed for checking the presence of voltage in the range of 100V to 250V. With its ergonomic shape and robust construction, the tester fits perfectly in hand, providing comfort and safety during work. Made from durable materials, it is resistant to mechanical damage and performs excellently in daily electrical tasks.


Key Features:




  • Voltage Range 100-250V: The tester is designed for versatile applications, making it ideal for checking voltage in household installations and electrical devices.




  • Compact Length of 185 mm: The optimal length ensures ease of use, portability, and convenient storage.




  • Ergonomic Handle: The transparent, ergonomically shaped handle provides comfort and a secure grip during work, enhancing precision and safety.




Example Applications:




  • Verification of Electrical Installations: Perfect for checking voltage in outlets, switches, and other elements of home and office electrical installations.




  • Testing Electrical Devices: Useful for checking the presence of voltage in electrical appliances, such as household appliances or power tools, allowing for quick diagnosis of potential issues.




  • Service and Repair Work: An indispensable tool for electricians, service technicians, and DIY enthusiasts who need a simple and effective solution for voltage verification.




  • Safe Work on Lighting Installations: The tester facilitates quick voltage checks in lighting wires during installation and maintenance.

description.name: Nitrlile gloves SOLID GRIP 50pcs size S, black
description.long_desc:
Nitrile Gloves Solid Grip are a durable, safe, and comfortable solution for demanding users. Made from high-quality nitrile, they provide excellent hand protection and user comfort. Their 3D diamond texture ensures a secure grip even in challenging conditions, while the increased thickness in the gripping area enhances resistance to damage. The chlorinated and polymer-coated interior makes them easy to put on, even on damp hands.


Technical Specifications:



  • Size: S

  • Color: Black

  • Material: Durable nitrile

  • Quantity in package: 50 pieces

  • Inner surface: Chlorinated and polymer-coated

  • Texture: 3D diamond texture

  • Type: Powder-free


Applications:



  • Precision and mechanical work requiring accuracy and dexterity

  • Automotive and service industries, e.g., vehicle repair and maintenance

  • Workshops and DIY projects, manual and technical tasks

  • Cleaning and maintenance, handling chemicals and detergents

  • Beauty and hairdressing industry, hair coloring, and care treatments

  • Laboratory and medical work, diagnostics, and testing

  • Food industry, food preparation, and kitchen handling

  • Agriculture and gardening, soil work, and fertilizer handling

  • Painting and renovation work, protection against paints and solvents

  • Chemical and pharmaceutical industries, handling chemical substances


Advantages:



  • Made of durable nitrile with increased resistance to tears and abrasions

  • Chlorinated and polymer-coated interior allows for quick and easy donning

  • Increased thickness in the gripping area provides better protection

  • 3D diamond texture ensures a secure grip and excellent tool sensitivity

  • Powder-free, minimizing the risk of allergies

  • Ideal for precision tasks requiring accuracy

  • Chlorinated and polymer-coated interior allows for quick and easy donning

  • Increased thickness in the gripping area provides better protection

  • 3D diamond texture ensures a secure grip and excellent tool sensitivity

  • Powder-free, minimizing the risk of allergies

  • Ideal for precision tasks requiring accuracy
description.description:
Nitrile Gloves Solid Grip are a durable, safe, and comfortable solution for demanding users. Made from high-quality nitrile, they provide excellent hand protection and user comfort. Their 3D diamond texture ensures a secure grip even in challenging conditions, while the increased thickness in the gripping area enhances resistance to damage. The chlorinated and polymer-coated interior makes them easy to put on, even on damp hands.


Technical Specifications:



  • Size: XXL

  • Color: Orange

  • Material: Durable nitrile

  • Quantity in package: 50 pieces

  • Inner surface: Chlorinated and polymer-coated

  • Texture: 3D diamond texture

  • Type: Powder-free


Applications:



  • Precision and mechanical work requiring accuracy and dexterity

  • Automotive and service industries, e.g., vehicle repair and maintenance

  • Workshops and DIY projects, manual and technical tasks

  • Cleaning and maintenance, handling chemicals and detergents

  • Beauty and hairdressing industry, hair coloring, and care treatments

  • Laboratory and medical work, diagnostics, and testing

  • Food industry, food preparation, and kitchen handling

  • Agriculture and gardening, soil work, and fertilizer handling

  • Painting and renovation work, protection against paints and solvents

  • Chemical and pharmaceutical industries, handling chemical substances


Advantages:



  • Made of durable nitrile with increased resistance to tears and abrasions

  • Chlorinated and polymer-coated interior allows for quick and easy donning

  • Increased thickness in the gripping area provides better protection

  • 3D diamond texture ensures a secure grip and excellent tool sensitivity

  • Powder-free, minimizing the risk of allergies

  • Ideal for precision tasks requiring accuracy

description.name: HDPE protective gloves 100pcs
description.long_desc:
Disposable Protective Gloves – Hygiene and Safety in Every Situation!


Gloves made of durable HDPE film provide protection against dirt and contact with chemicals. Ideal for use in various industries – gastronomy, medicine, cosmetology, and everyday household applications.


Practical and Comfortable



  • Universal size – fits most hands

  • Thin yet durable – does not restrict movement

  • Tear-resistant – provides protection when in contact with water and other substances


Versatile Use



  • Ideal for gastronomy – ensures hygienic food preparation

  • Protection in stores and gas stations – perfect for handling money and touch surfaces

  • For cleaning and household chores – protects skin from detergents

  • Used in cosmetology and hairdressing – essential for applying cosmetics


Product Specifications:



  • Material: HDPE film

  • Packaging: 100 pieces

  • Color: Transparent

  • Intended use: Single-use only

description.name: Powerbank workshop lamp with magnet and light regulation + charging station LED COB 10W + 5W 2000mAh 550lm IP54
description.long_desc:
LED Workshop Lamp 10W + 5W is a modern, multifunctional device designed to provide excellent lighting in all conditions. Equipped with dual light sources, a power bank function, and a charging station, it is an indispensable tool for workshops, garages, servicing, or travel.


The articulated magnetic base offers maximum versatility and convenience. Its durable hinge design allows rotation and angle adjustment to direct the light precisely where needed. The built-in strong magnet ensures stable attachment to metal surfaces such as car parts, workbenches, or steel structures, making it perfect for users who need hands-free operation.


Technical Specifications:



  • Material: PC + TPR + ABS + Aluminum

  • Product Size: 198x63x29mm

  • Battery Type: 18650 3.7V Li-ion

  • Battery Capacity: 2000 mAh

  • Charging Port: USB Type-C

  • Charging Time: Approx. 2.5 hours

  • Overcharge Voltage: 4.2V

  • Discharge Voltage: 3V

  • Accessories: Charging station, USB Type-C cable

  • Certification: CE/ROHS


Lighting:



  • Main Light Source: 10W COB LED, 550 lumens – provides wide, bright, and uniform illumination.

  • Spotlight (Top): 5W LED, 250 lumens – generates a focused light beam ideal for precision tasks.


Product Features:


Dual Light Sources:



  • Main COB LED 10W: 550-lumen output for broad, bright illumination.

  • Spotlight LED 5W: Focused 250-lumen beam for detailed work.


Power Bank Function:



  • Equipped with a 2000 mAh Li-ion battery, the lamp allows mobile devices to be charged via the USB Type-C port.


Four Lighting Modes:



  • Spotlight, main light, red light, and flashing red light – perfect for work, signaling, and emergency situations.


Smooth Light Intensity Adjustment:



  • The main light source allows precise brightness control to meet user needs.


Ergonomic Design:



  • Extendable, Articulated Base with Strong Magnet: Enables positioning at any angle and attachment to metal surfaces.

  • Rotating Hook and Rear Magnet: Provide versatile mounting options.


Smart Charging Indicators:



  • 5 LED indicators display battery charge status, eliminating the risk of unexpected shutdown.


Performance:



  • Working Time:

    • 3.5 hours – Spotlight

    • 2.5 hours – Main COB light



  • Charging Time: Approx. 2.5 hours


Solid Build and Certification:



  • Material: PC + TPR + ABS + Aluminum – durable and damage-resistant construction.

  • Certifications: CE/ROHS – guarantees quality and safety.


Set Includes:



  • Charging station for convenient lamp charging.

  • USB Type-C cable.


Applications:



  • Workshop and servicing tasks

  • Emergency light source

  • Camping and travel

  • Signaling (red light/flashing mode)

description.name: Multifunctional flashlight with magnet and UV LED COB 5W 2000mAh 300lm IP54 – display box
description.long_desc:
Multifunctional 5W + UV COB LED Flashlight is an indispensable tool for professionals and individual users. With its compact yet durable design and advanced lighting technology, it is suitable for various situations – from workshop tasks to diagnostic applications.


Technical Specifications:



  • Material: Aluminum + ABS

  • Battery Type: 3.7V Li-Ion

  • Battery Capacity: 2000mAh

  • Top Light: 1W XPE LED

  • Side Light: 5W COB LED (300 lumens) + UV LED

  • Charging Port: USB Type-C

  • Charging Time: 3 hours

  • Working Time: Up to 5 hours

  • Number of Magnets: 2

  • Protection Rating: IP54

  • Certification: CE, RoHS


Product Features:


Durable Construction:



  • Aluminum + ABS: A robust and lightweight design resistant to mechanical damage.


Advanced Light Sources:



  • Top Lighting: 1W XPE LED – a focused, precise beam ideal for tasks requiring a concentrated light.

  • Side Lighting: 5W COB LED with 300 lumens – delivers wide and uniform surface illumination.

  • UV Light: Perfect for technical diagnostics, leak detection, UV mark inspection, and other specialized applications.


Efficient Battery:



  • Battery Type: 3.7V Lithium-ion.

  • Capacity: 2000mAh – provides a long working time of up to 5 hours.

  • Charging Time: 3 hours with fast charging via the USB Type-C port.


Built-In Magnets:



  • Two magnets integrated into the housing allow easy and stable attachment of the flashlight to metal surfaces – ideal for workshop and servicing tasks.


IP54 Protection Rating:



  • High resistance to dust and splashes ensures reliability even in tough conditions.


Applications:



  • Workshop and servicing tasks

  • Technical diagnostics using UV light

  • Emergency and everyday lighting

  • Inspection and leak detection

  • Use during travel, camping, and in the field

description.name: Mini pocket flashlight with a magnet LED COB 6W 500mAh 300lm IPX4 – display box
description.long_desc:
Pocket LED COB 5W Flashlight is a versatile and compact light source designed for everyday user needs. It offers an excellent combination of power, mobility, and functionality. With its compact design, magnetic mount, adjustable base, and carabiner, it’s the perfect solution for those who value practicality and reliability in every situation.


Product Features:


5W COB LED Light Source:



  • The 5W COB LED diode generates 300 lumens of light, providing a wide and even beam, ideal for illuminating larger areas.


Three Lighting Modes:



  • High – Full brightness for intense illumination.

  • Low – Energy-saving mode with reduced light intensity.

  • Strobe – Flashing signal, perfect for emergencies and signaling.


Built-In 500 mAh Battery:



  • The 500 mAh lithium-ion battery ensures long-lasting operation and can be quickly and conveniently recharged via the USB Type-C port.


Adjustable Magnetic Base:



  • A strong magnet in the base allows easy attachment to metal surfaces, while the hinged design enables precise adjustment of the light angle.


Functional Carabiner:



  • The integrated hook allows the flashlight to be attached to a backpack, belt loop, bag, or keys, keeping it always within reach.


IPX4 Protection Rating:



  • Water-resistant at IPX4 level, protecting the flashlight from splashes, ensuring safe use in various weather conditions.


Applications:



  • Workshop or garage work

  • Travel and camping lighting

  • Emergency flashlight at home or in the car

  • Additional lighting for outdoor activities

description.name: Mini tactical flashlight LED COB 10W 500mAh 500lm IPX5 – display box
description.long_desc:
Mini Tactical LED XPE/COB 10W Flashlight is a powerful, multifunctional light source that combines modern technology with a compact design. With its high power and versatility, it is ideal for everyday tasks, outdoor activities, and emergency situations.


With dual light sources, telescopic zoom, and three lighting modes, it adapts perfectly to various uses. Its compact size, built-in battery, and mounting clip make it a reliable tool always at hand, ready for action in any condition.


Product Features:


Dual LED Light Sources:



  • XPE LED Diode: Focused, high-precision light, ideal for illuminating distant areas.

  • COB LED Diode: Wide, intense light that perfectly illuminates larger spaces.


Three Lighting Modes:



  1. XPE LED: Constant light and strobe mode (emergency signal).

  2. COB LED: Constant light for broad area illumination.


Telescopic Zoom:



  • Adjustable light beam allows for precise switching between wide-area lighting and a focused spotlight.


Built-in 500 mAh Battery:



  • Efficient lithium-ion battery ensures long flashlight operation, and charging is quick and convenient via the micro USB port.

  • Micro USB cable included in the set.


Durability and Functionality:



  • IPX5 Protection Rating: Splash-resistant, allowing the flashlight to be used even in challenging weather conditions.

  • Mounting Clip: A practical clip for attaching the flashlight to a belt, backpack, or pocket, ensuring quick access during work or travel.


Compact Design:



  • Small size and sturdy housing make the flashlight easy to transport and use, even in tight spaces.


Applications:



  • Workshop and repair tasks

  • Outdoor activities: Camping, hiking, and mountain expeditions

  • Emergency flashlight for home and car use

  • Lighting for uniformed and tactical services

  • Accessory for DIY enthusiasts and professionals

description.name: Tactical flashlight LED XHP50 15W 1800mAh 1500lm IPX8
description.long_desc:
The XHP50 15W Tactical LED Flashlight is a professional device designed for the most demanding users. With its high power, durable construction, and versatile lighting modes, it performs well in all conditions – from military tasks to outdoor and emergency applications.


The GEKO tactical flashlight combines power, functionality, and durability. Equipped with five lighting modes, telescopic zoom, and IPX8 waterproofing, it is perfect for the most challenging situations. Thanks to its dual power option – a rechargeable battery or AAA batteries – and a practical carrying case, it is always ready for action whenever you need it.


Technical Specifications:


Material: Aluminum alloy


Power Supply: 1800mAh Li-ion battery or 3x AAA batteries


Light Source: XHP50 LED diode, 15W, 1500 lumens


Lighting Modes: High / Medium / Low / Strobe / SOS


Zoom Type: Telescopic


Protection Rating: IPX8


Charging Port: USB Type-C


Product Features:


Light Source:



  • High-Performance XHP50 LED Diode (15W): Produces intense, long-range light.

  • Telescopic Zoom: Allows adjustment of the light beam from wide floodlight to a focused stream, tailored to user needs.


Lighting Modes:



  • 5 Operating Modes: High / Medium / Low / Strobe / SOS.

  • Strobe and SOS Functions: Provide additional safety in emergency situations.


Power Supply:



  • 1800mAh Li-ion Battery: Ensures long-lasting operation and quick charging.

  • AAA Battery Compatibility: Use of 3 AAA batteries with an adapter for versatility and flexible power options in the field.


Durable Construction:



  • Material: High-strength aluminum alloy resistant to mechanical damage.

  • IPX8 Protection Rating: Fully waterproof and submersible, ensuring reliable operation in harsh weather conditions.


Ergonomics and User Convenience:



  • Tactical Design: Ideal for carrying in a backpack or mounting on tactical gear.

  • Non-Slip Grip and Wrist Strap: Enhance comfort and user safety during operation.


Durable Carrying Case:



  • The entire set is packed in a solid, damage-resistant plastic case – perfect for transporting and protecting the flashlight.


Applications:



  • Tactical and military tasks

  • Survival and outdoor expeditions

  • Emergency lighting during power outages or accidents

  • Workshop and garage use
description.short_desc:
The XHP50 15W Tactical LED Flashlight is a professional device designed for the most demanding users. With its high power, durable construction, and versatile lighting modes, it performs well in all conditions – from military tasks to outdoor and emergency applications.


The GEKO tactical flashlight combines power, functionality, and durability. Equipped with five lighting modes, telescopic zoom, and IPX8 waterproofing, it is perfect for the most challenging situations. Thanks to its dual power option – a rechargeable battery or AAA batteries – and a practical carrying case, it is always ready for action whenever you need it.


Technical Specifications:


Material: Aluminum alloy


Power Supply: 1800mAh Li-ion battery or 3x AAA batteries


Light Source: XHP50 LED diode, 15W, 1500 lumens


Lighting Modes: High / Medium / Low / Strobe / SOS


Zoom Type: Telescopic


Protection Rating: IPX8


Charging Port: USB Type-C


Product Features:


Light Source:



  • High-Performance XHP50 LED Diode (15W): Produces intense, long-range light.

  • Telescopic Zoom: Allows adjustment of the light beam from wide floodlight to a focused stream, tailored to user needs.


Lighting Modes:



  • 5 Operating Modes: High / Medium / Low / Strobe / SOS.

  • Strobe and SOS Functions: Provide additional safety in emergency situations.


Power Supply:



  • 1800mAh Li-ion Battery: Ensures long-lasting operation and quick charging.

  • AAA Battery Compatibility: Use of 3 AAA batteries with an adapter for versatility and flexible power options in the field.


Durable Construction:

Ergonomics and User Convenience:

description.name: Workshop lamp with magnet and light regulation LED COB 10W 1800mAh 450lm IP44
description.long_desc:
This compact and functional LED lamp with COB technology is an excellent lighting solution for workshops, garages, service work, and outdoor applications. With rechargeable power supply and a powerful 450 lm light output, it provides bright and even illumination regardless of the work environment.

Key Features and Benefits
Powerful light source – 10W COB LED generates a 450 lm light output, ensuring excellent visibility in dark spaces.
Long battery life – The 1800 mAh battery provides up to 4 hours of continuous operation.
360° magnetic mount – Allows for full rotation and stable attachment to metal surfaces.
Additional hanging hook – Ensures convenient use in any location.
Smooth brightness adjustment – Enables customizable light intensity according to needs.
Wide beam angle – 120° coverage for even illumination of large areas.
Weather resistance – IP44 rating, protecting against moisture and dust.
Wide operating temperature range – Functions flawlessly in extreme conditions from -45°C to 50°C.
Micro USB charging – A convenient and universal way to recharge the device.
Technical Specifications
Light source: 10W COB LED
Luminous flux: 450 lm
Power supply: Rechargeable battery
Battery capacity: 1800 mAh
Operating time: 4 hours
Operating temperature: -45°C to 50°C
Insulation class: IP44 (dust and splash resistance)
Beam angle: 120°
CRI (Color Rendering Index): >80 Ra
Brightness adjustment: Smooth
Mounting options: 360° magnetic mount
Additional hook: Yes, for hanging
Charging: Micro USB
Dimensions: 37.5 x 3.5 x 2.6 cm

description.name: Powerbank workshop lamp with magnet and light regulation LED COB 5W + 3W 2000mAh 400lm IP44
description.long_desc:
Modern LED Workshop Lamp 5W + 3W is a multifunctional device that combines powerful lighting, functionality, and mobility. Perfect for workshops, garages, fieldwork, and as a reliable emergency light source.


The workshop lamp with a power bank function is a solid, reliable, and versatile solution for both professionals and individual users. Thanks to high-quality COB LED diodes, a durable battery, and practical mounting solutions, it performs well in all conditions.


Technical Specifications:



  • Material: ABS + PC + TPR + Aluminum

  • Light Sources: 5W COB LED (main light) + 3W LED (front light)

  • Battery: 2000 mAh 3.7V Li-ion

  • Working Time: 2-2.5 hours (main 5W light) / 3-3.5 hours (front 3W light)

  • Charging Time: approx. 3 hours

  • Charging Port: USB Type-C

  • Power Bank Port: USB


Key Features and Characteristics


Dual LED Light Sources:



  • Main Light Source: 5W COB LED with 400 lumens – delivers bright, wide, and even illumination of the workspace.

  • Front Light: 3W LED – ideal for precision tasks requiring focused light.


2000 mAh 3.7V Li-ion Battery:



  • Ensures long working time and convenient usage.

  • Charging is done via the USB Type-C port.


Power Bank Functionality:



  • Equipped with a USB port that allows charging mobile devices (phones, tablets) anywhere.


Adjustable Light Intensity:



  • The main light source features smooth brightness adjustment, enabling customization to the user’s needs.


Practical Mounting and Handle:



  • Tiltable Base with Magnet: Allows stable positioning of the lamp at various angles and attachment to metal surfaces.

  • Rotating Hook: Integrated into the back of the lamp for hanging the device anywhere.

  • Additional Rear Magnet: Increases versatility during work.


Battery Charge Status:



  • Built-in 5-LED indicator shows the battery level, eliminating the risk of unexpected shutdown.

description.name: Utility knife 100x18x0.5mm type nr. 2
description.long_desc:
Wallpaper Knife 100x18x0.5mm – Precision and Durability for Cutting!


The utility knife is designed for precise cutting of paper, foil, wallpaper, cardboard, and many other materials. Its robust construction and high-quality SK5 steel blade ensure long-lasting and comfortable use.


Key Features:



  • Durable SK5 Blade – Made from high-quality steel with a 0.5 mm thickness, ensuring strength and longevity.

  • Precision Cutting – The 18 mm wide and 100 mm long blade allows for smooth and accurate cuts.

  • Auto-Lock System – A blade-locking mechanism keeps the blade securely in place for safe operation.

  • Ergonomic Casing – A comfortable grip with anti-slip elements ensures a secure hold and ease of use.

  • Replaceable Blade – Worn-out blade segments can be easily snapped off or replaced with a new one.

  • Built-in Blade Storage – A practical compartment in the rear section of the knife for spare blades.


Applications:



  • Upholstery work

  • Cutting paper, foil, wallpaper, and cardboard

  • Renovation and decorative tasks

  • Office and household use

description.name: White extension cord with switch 3 sockets 3m
description.long_desc:
A functional 3-socket power extension cord with grounding and a switch, perfect for everyday use both at home and in the office.


The sockets ensure hassle-free connection and disconnection of devices without excessive effort.
Three grounded sockets with a 45-degree angle allow for convenient connection of larger plugs.
A 3-meter-long cable provides flexibility in placing devices anywhere you need.
The built-in safety switch enhances protection and control over connected devices.
CE certification and a durable construction guarantee longevity and safe use.


Technical specifications:



  • Brand: Keltin

  • Number of sockets: 3 (with grounding)

  • Socket angle: 45°

  • Cable length: 3 m

  • Cable cross-section: 3x1.5mm2


  • Maximum power of connected devices: 2500W

  • Color: White

  • Switch: Yes

  • Protection: IP20

  • Dimensions: 18 cm x 5.2 cm

  • Height with switch: 4.5 cm

  • Certification: CE

description.name: Utility knife 125x25x0.7mm SK2H TVARDY
description.long_desc:
A reliable partner for every workshop and construction site. Designed with demanding users in mind, it combines durability, precision, and comfort, making it an excellent choice for both heavy-duty tasks and more delicate work.


Durable SK2H hardened steel blade – with a hardness level of HRC 62-64, it performs excellently with a variety of materials, from cardboard to thicker plastics. The blade's 0.7 mm thickness and 25 mm width ensure stability and resistance to breakage.
Convenient spare blade storage – always within reach, providing maximum convenience and uninterrupted work.
Precise blade extension mechanism – operates smoothly and reliably, allowing quick adjustment of blade length to suit current needs.
Elegant black design – where robustness meets style, appealing to every user.


Technical Specifications:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Blade Material: SK2H steel

  • Hardness: HRC 62-64

  • Blade length: 125 mm

  • Blade Width: 25 mm

  • Blade Thickness: 0.7 mm

  • Color: Black

  • Quantity: 1 pcs

description.name: 700W 6mm Electric straight die grinder with speed regulation
description.long_desc:
The Geko 700W straight die grinder is a powerful and precise tool designed for working on materials such as metal, wood, and plastics. Equipped with a 6 mm spindle and a robust 700W motor, it allows for grinding, polishing, and processing of details, even in hard-to-reach areas. With adjustable speed control and a maximum speed of 27,000 RPM, the tool enables precise adaptation to the specific material being worked on.



  • Precise grinding of metal, wooden, or plastic components.

  • Detail processing in hard-to-reach areas, thanks to the slim and straight design of the device.

  • Polishing, milling, and material removal during mechanical repairs or carpentry work.

  • Creating smooth edges and finishing surfaces of structural components.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Power supply: 230V ~50Hz

  • Motor power: 700W

  • Spindle diameter: 6 mm

  • Maximum speed: 27,000 RPM

  • Speed control: Yes

  • Comfortable soft-grip handle


Included in the Set:




  • 700W die grinder




  • 2 assembly wrenches – for easy grinding stone replacement




  • Spare carbon brushes – ensuring longer tool life




  • 4 flap wheels with spindle




  • Set of mounted grinding stones:




    • Pink:



      • 3 cylindrical

      • 2 conical

      • 1 spherical




    • Gray:



      • 3 cylindrical

      • 2 conical

      • 1 spherical




    • White:



      • 3 cylindrical

      • 1 spherical

description.name: 1600W paint and mortar electric mixer
description.long_desc:
The Geko 1600W electric mixer is a robust and efficient tool designed for mixing paints, mortars, plasters, and other construction materials. With its powerful 1600W motor and two operating modes, it ensures precise mixing even for dense materials. It is the perfect solution for professionals and DIY enthusiasts undertaking renovations or construction work.


1600W power – high performance allows for quick and accurate mixing of materials with varying consistencies.
2 speed modes:
Level I: 240-500 RPM – for heavy and dense mortars and adhesives.
Level II: 380-850 RPM – for lighter materials such as paints and plasters.
Speed adjustment – enables you to set the speed according to the type of material being mixed, ensuring precision and comfort.
M14 thread – a standard fitting compatible with most mixers available on the market.
Long 60 cm mixer with a 14 cm diameter – allows for use in larger containers.
Ergonomic Easy Grip handle – provides a secure and comfortable grip, ensuring full control over the device.
2 m cable length – convenient for use in any workspace.


Technical Specifications:
Manufacturer: Geko
Power supply: 230V ~50Hz
Power: 1600W
Speed ranges:
Level I: 240-500 RPM
Level II: 380-850 RPM
Thread: M14
Mixer length: 60 cm
Mixer diameter: 14 cm
Cable length: 2 m
Handle: Anti-slip, ensuring a secure and comfortable grip


Included in the Set:
Geko 1600W electric mixer
Assembly wrenches – for easy tightening and loosening of the mixer.
Spare carbon brushes – ensure a longer device lifespan.

Included in the Set:
Geko 1600W electric mixer
Assembly wrenches – for easy tightening and loosening of the mixer.
Spare carbon brushes – ensure a longer device lifespan.

description.name: Welding cart with handle and 4 drawers
description.long_desc:
Mobile Welding Cart: Organization, Efficiency, and Easy Equipment Transport


The mobile welding cart is a solution designed to help you maintain order, boost efficiency, and conveniently transport equipment between workstations. With its sturdy construction and thoughtfully organized storage space, this cart is an indispensable tool for daily tasks.


Key Features:



  • Durable Steel Construction: Powder-coated finish ensures resistance to corrosion and damage.

  • Full Mobility: Two large 15 cm fixed wheels provide stability, while two 360° swivel wheels allow for easy maneuverability in tight spaces.

  • Thoughtful Space Organization:

    • Two shelves – ideal for larger tools and accessories.

    • Four spacious drawers with smooth-gliding rails for quick access to smaller items such as electrodes or hand tools.

    • Dedicated space for a gas cylinder with securing chains for stability and safety during transport.

    • Two cable holders for welding machine cables – preventing tangles, enhancing organization, and extending cable lifespan.




Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Material: Powder-coated steel

  • Color: Black

  • Cart dimensions with wheels: 70.5 x 70.5 x 40 cm

  • Top shelf: 45 x 28 cm

  • Bottom shelf: 46 x 28 cm (height adjustable from 16.5 to 24 cm)

  • Four drawers: 25.5 x 18 x 5.5 cm each

  • Gas cylinder space: 29 x 25.5 cm

  • Space behind drawers: 29 x 16 x 32 cm

  • Wheels: Two fixed (15 cm) and two swivel (360°)

  • Chains: Two included, for securing the gas cylinder


This mobile welding cart combines durability, functionality, and convenience to create a perfect organizational tool for any workspace. Stay efficient and keep all your essentials within easy reach!
